Name: Mini Arenas
About the game: Mini Arenas is a PVP online game where you and your friends fight each other in simple but intense battles. Fight to stay alive in this fast paced shooter, where the only thing that matters is victory! Mini Arenas includes: - Online multiplayer - Character customization - Fast-paced gameplay - A variety of stages to play on - Multiple unique classes classes to choose from All for the low price of free!
